Package com.swop.blocks

Class StatementBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swop.blocks.Block
      • com.swop.blocks.BlockWithBody
        • com.swop.blocks.StatementBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Executable, VerticallyConnectable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    IfBlock, WhileBlock
    public abstract class StatementBlock
extends BlockWithBody
implements Executable, VerticallyConnectable
    A block that is a statement.
